family_experience.description: The all-new Allez is built to explode off the front and deliver unbridled speed to the ride, and all without blowing up your wallet in process. With pro-level looks, high-end performance, and a feisty demeanour that’ll serve you well on weekend rides or when lining up in local races, this bike is ready to take you to the next level in your riding.

rider_benefits.rider_benefit: Double-butted A1 Premium Aluminium and E5 Premium Aluminium with Smartweld technology frames plus FACT carbon forks, are light weight and feature our race-tuned geometry for precise handling and increased torsional stiffness for sprinting
Our Espoir Sport 25c tyres are wider for more comfort and confidence when cornering, while the Riva Body Geometry saddle is lab tested to assure blood flow to sensitive arteries
The Allez is equipped with race-ready components, and upgradeable to ensure performance for years to come
Smartweld technology for incredible performance in stiffness, compliance, and super light weight

features.what1: WHAT: Double-butted A1 Premium Aluminium and E5 Premium Aluminium frames.
features.why1: WHY: Light weight frame offers unsurpassed quality and features our proven geometry for precise handling.
features.how1: HOW: Through methodical tube shaping and enhanced weld techniques, our engineers manipulate every aspect of the frame for experience-specific performance.
features.what2: WHAT: High-performance AXIS wheelset and Espoir tyres.
features.why2: WHY: For durable performance, plus reliable and confident handling with low rolling resistance.
features.how2: HOW: Specialized Espoir 25c tyres deliver increased comfort and efficiency when cornering, and feature BlackBelt protection for fewer flats. Strong, efficient and highly engineered AXIS wheelset provides a stable, confident ride.
features.why3: WHY: For a light, stiff and most compliant ride.
features.how3: HOW: A breakthrough in the weld location allows for a more durable, stiffer headtube junction which means more material in low stress areas can be removed. Size-specific tubes allow engineers to tune the ride for ultimate compliance.
features.what4: WHAT: Specialized Riva saddle and short-reach bars.
features.why4: WHY: To relieve common rider pressure/pain points while riding.
features.how4: HOW: The Specialized ergonomically designed, Riva Body Geometry saddle is lab tested to ensure blood flow to sensitive arteries, which alleviates rider discomfort. Short-reach drop bars improve a rider’s position to create a more comfortable, confident position for long rides.
